name: The Old Shelter
description:
Where do legends go to end their days?

Secretly... In the deepest depths of the forest of Piul... some of the greatest personalities took upon themselves to build a place in which to live their last days. A place for them to retire when their time comes.

Many are the beings that looked after the dwellers of this place, many are the ones that did not return, or ever leave. Now you... you are the last of them.

Keep Them Alive

Basic Controls

Movement: WASD keys

Pick /Throw Item: F/ Q keys
